definition[0]: an act of deliberately hurting someone in order to force them to tell you something, to punish them, or to be cruel
example[0]: He died after five days of excruciating torture.
example[1]: The waiting must be torture for you.
definition[2]: to deliberately hurt someone in order to force them to give you information, to punish them, or to be cruel
example[2]: Political opponents of the regime may be tortured.
definition[3]: if a feeling or knowledge tortures you, it makes you suffer a lot mentally
example[3]: Rachel sat alone for hours at home, tortured by jealousy.
